Мнемоника

purpleculture_pinyin:
lǚ
surname Lü; pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
фамилия Лю; смоляная труба, стандарт высоты звука, один из двенадцати полутонов в традиционной тональной системе
rtega_mnemonic:
呂呂RS
吕吕		a musical note, spine, backbone
  • to mouths 口 singing connected (related) notes 丨
  • two vertebrae 口 connected 丨 in the spine
宮 営
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿳ Above to middle and below
    • 口 [ kǒu ] mouth; entrance, gate, opening
    • 丿 [ piě ] slash
    • 口 [ kǒu ] mouth; entrance, gate, opening
heisig_story: This character is rather like a picture of two of the vertebrae in the spine linked by a single stroke.
koohiiStory2: The spine goes from one opening mouth/opening (mouth/face) to another mouth/opening (genitals). Just think of these openings being enlarged to represent the head and the body. The bottom is bigger because the body is bigger than the face.
jp_example_words:
風呂(ふろ): bath
風呂敷(ふろしき): wrapping cloth, cloth wrapper
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: I hope all you're doing in the bathtub is taking a bath. I mean, you can do other things if you want I guess. But bathtubs were made just for baths!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture yourself taking a bath in your bathtub. Relaxing!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: When do you miss taking a bath the most? When you're on the road (ろ). Traveling is fun and all, but when you're stuck in a car, traveling down a dirt road for days, all you want to do is take a nice long bath.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine being stuck on the road all day for a week. Imagine how good a bath will feel when you finally get home. Nice and hot and relaxing. Mmmm...
Ru_Notes:
В основном используется в большом количестве производных слова 風呂 и в названиях.
Сравни: 侶 (とも、リョ、ロ товарищ)

Kanshudo_mnemonic: the stick (丨) between the two mouths (口) is the spine
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This is a pictograph of a person - head and body.  In the middle the empty space represents a spine.
humanum_full_description_en:
A and Bronze inscriptions are composed of two circles, like a metal block, which is the name of a certain metal. Because Oracle uses a knife to engrave characters on the bones, the font shape is more like a square under the influence of writing tools. There are filled in in the middle of the circle of " Lu " in bronze inscriptions, and some are left blank. After adding " gold ", write " aluminum ". " Lu " was originally written as " Lu ", and a short vertical column was added between the two circles in the seal script. The official script evolved into a short stroke, which became the later glyph " Lu ".

The " Lu " in Jia Jinwen is an example of the original meaning. For example, "Compilation" 29687: "It casts Huang Lu □." "Bing Zang" 2567: "Wang Qi casts Huang Lu Dian 𧖸." Xiao Fu Gui: "Xiu Wang Yi (given) imitates his father Lu San."

" Lu " is also used as the name of a person, place or country. For example, "Compilation" 2002 reversed: "隹(Only) Lu You (you)." "Compilation" 6778: "...Fang Wei Yu Lu." Lv Wang Li: "Lu Wang Zha (made) [阝尊] ( Zun) Li, the descendants and grandchildren Sun Yongbao use it (enjoy)."

"Said Wen": "Lu, spine also. Pictogram. Xitaiyue was Yu Xin Lu's minister, so he was named Lu Hou. All Lu's belongings are from Lu. Lv, seal script Lu Cong Rou Cong Lv." Yoshihara of Spine Without the original character, it was expressed under the guise of " Lu ", and later the word "膂" was created. (Refer to "Zi Yuan") " Lu " means spine, such as "Jijuu Pian" "Shiri hip, spine, waist and back Lu", Yan Shi's ancient annotation: "Lu, spine."

" Lu " is also the name of ancient Chinese musical rhythms and the general term for Yin rhythms. "Han Shu. "Lv Li Zhi": "Law ten has two, yang six is the law, yin six is Lu. [...] Lu Yi travels to Yang to xuanqi, one is Lin Zhong, second is Nan Lu, third is Ying Zhong, and fourth is Da Lu, the fifth is the clock, and the sixth is Zhonglu."

" Lu " was still the name of an ancient country, and was later destroyed by Chu. "Mandarin. "Zheng Yu": "As a Zhou, there are Jingman, Shen, Lu, Ying, Deng, Chen, Cai, Sui, Tang in the south." It can also be used as a surname, such as Qin Xiang Lu Buwei during the Warring States Period, and Lu Bu, a general during the Three Kingdoms period.
humanum_short_description_en: A and Bronze inscriptions are composed of two circles, like a metal block, which is the name of a certain metal.
humanum_full_description:
甲、金文由兩個圓圈組成，象金屬塊之形，是某種金屬之名。由於甲骨文是以刀在骨頭上刻上文字，受到書寫工具的影響，字形更像方形。金文「呂」的圈形中間有填實的，也有留空的。後增「金」旁，寫作「鋁」。「呂」本作「吕」，篆文在兩個圓形中間加了一個短豎，隸書又演變為一短撇，成為後來的字形「呂」。

　　甲金文「呂」用為本義的例子。如《合集》29687：「其鑄黃呂□。」《英藏》2567：「王其鑄黃呂奠𧖸。」效父簋：「休王易（賜）效父呂三。」

　　「呂」又用為人名、地名或方國名。如《合集》2002反：「隹（唯）呂又（祐）。」《合集》6778正：「……方圍于呂。」呂王鬲：「呂王乍（作）[阝尊]（尊）鬲，子子孫孫永寶用亯（享）。」

　　《說文》：「呂，脊骨也。象形。昔太嶽爲禹心呂之臣，故封呂侯。凡呂之屬皆从呂。膂，篆文呂从肉从旅。」脊骨之義原無本字，假借「呂」表示，後來又另造「膂」字表示。（參《字源》）「呂」表示脊骨的例如《急就篇》「尻髖脊膂腰背呂」，顏師古注：「呂，脊骨也。」

　　「呂」也是中國古代樂律之名，又是陰律的總稱。《漢書．律曆志》：「律十有二，陽六為律，陰六為呂。[……]呂以旅陽宣氣，一曰林鐘，二曰南呂，三曰應鐘，四曰大呂，五曰夾鐘，六曰中呂。」

　　「呂」還是古國名，後為楚國所滅。《國語．鄭語》：「當成周者，南有荊蠻、申、呂、應、鄧、陳、蔡、隨、唐。」又可作姓氏，如戰國時期秦相呂不韋、三國時期將領呂布。
humanum_short_description: 甲、金文由兩個圓圈組成，象金屬塊之形，是某種金屬之名。

甲、金文由兩個圓圈組成，象金屬塊之形，是某種金屬之名。由於甲骨文是以刀在骨頭上刻上文字，受到書寫工具的影響，字形更像方形。金文「 呂 」的圈形中間有填實的，也有留空的。後增「 金 」旁，寫作「 鋁 」。「 呂 」本作「 吕 」，篆文在兩個圓形中間加了一個短豎，隸書又演變為一短撇，成為後來的字形「 呂 」。 甲金文「 呂 」用為本義的例子。如《合集》29687：「其鑄黃呂□。」《英藏》2567：「王其鑄黃呂奠𧖸。」效父簋：「休王易（賜）效父呂三。」 「 呂 」又用為人名、地名或方國名。如《合集》2002反：「隹（唯）呂又（祐）。」《合集》6778正：「……方圍于呂。」呂王鬲：「呂王乍（作）[阝尊]（尊）鬲，子子孫孫永寶用亯（享）。」 《說文》：「呂，脊骨也。象形。昔太嶽爲禹心呂之臣，故封呂侯。凡呂之屬皆从呂。膂，篆文呂从肉从旅。」脊骨之義原無本字，假借「 呂 」表示，後來又另造「 膂 」字表示。（參《字源》）「 呂 」表示脊骨的例如《急就篇》「尻髖脊膂腰背呂」，顏師古注：「呂，脊骨也。」 「 呂 」也是中國古代樂律之名，又是陰律的總稱。《漢書．律曆志》：「律十有二，陽六為律，陰六為呂。[……]呂以旅陽宣氣，一曰林鐘，二曰南呂，三曰應鐘，四曰大呂，五曰夾鐘，六曰中呂。」 「 呂 」還是古國名，後為楚國所滅。《國語．鄭語》：「當成周者，南有荊蠻、申、呂、應、鄧、陳、蔡、隨、唐。」又可作姓氏，如戰國時期秦相呂不韋、三國時期將領呂布。
A and Bronze inscriptions are composed of two circles, like a metal block, which is the name of a certain metal. Because Oracle uses a knife to engrave characters on the bones, the font shape is more like a square under the influence of writing tools. There are filled in in the middle of the circle of " Lu" in bronze inscriptions, and some are left blank. After adding " gold", write " aluminum". " Lu" was originally written as " Lu", and a short vertical column was added between the two circles in the seal script. The official script evolved into a short stroke, which became the later glyph " Lu". The " Lu" in Jia Jinwen is an example of the original meaning. For example, "Compilation" 29687: "It casts Huang Lu □." "Bing Zang" 2567: "Wang Qi casts Huang Lu Dian 𧖸." Xiao Fu Gui: "Xiu Wang Yi (given) imitates his father Lu San." " Lu" is also used as the name of a person, place or country. For example, "Compilation" 2002 reversed: "隹(Only) Lu You (you)." "Compilation" 6778: "...Fang Wei Yu Lu." Lv Wang Li: "Lu Wang Zha (made) [阝尊] ( Zun) Li, the descendants and grandchildren Sun Yongbao use it (enjoy)." "Said Wen": "Lu, spine also. Pictogram. Xitaiyue was Yu Xin Lu's minister, so he was named Lu Hou. All Lu's belongings are from Lu. Lv, seal script Lu Cong Rou Cong Lv." Yoshihara of Spine Without the original character, it was expressed under the guise of " Lu", and later the word " 膂" was created. (Refer to "Zi Yuan") " Lu" means spine, such as "Jijuu Pian" "Shiri hip, spine, waist and back Lu", Yan Shi's ancient annotation: "Lu, spine." " Lu" is also the name of ancient Chinese musical rhythms and the general term for Yin rhythms. "Han Shu. "Lv Li Zhi": "Law ten has two, yang six is the law, yin six is Lu. [...] Lu Yi travels to Yang to xuanqi, one is Lin Zhong, second is Nan Lu, third is Ying Zhong, and fourth is Da Lu, the fifth is the clock, and the sixth is Zhonglu." " Lu" was still the name of an ancient country, and was later destroyed by Chu. "Mandarin. "Zheng Yu": "As a Zhou, there are Jingman, Shen, Lu, Ying, Deng, Chen, Cai, Sui, Tang in the south." It can also be used as a surname, such as Qin Xiang Lu Buwei during the Warring States Period, and Lu Bu, a general during the Three Kingdoms period.

呂字的基本解释

呂
lǚ
同“吕”。

呂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bù］
［《廣韻》分勿切，入物，非。］
(1)无，没有。
(2)非，不是。
(3)不到，未。
(4)副词。表否定。
(5)副词。表禁止。勿，不要。
(6)副词。单用，做否定性的回答。
(7)副词。方言。用在句末表示疑问，跟反复问句的作用相等。
(8)副词。用在动补结构中间，表示不可能达到某种结果。
(9)副词。“不”字的前后叠用相同的名词，表示不在乎或不相干。
(10)副词。跟“便”“就”搭用，表示选择。
(11)副词。方言。不用；不要（限用于某些套语）。
(12)助词。无义。用以足句或加强语气。
(13)助词。无义。表示反问语气。
(14)通“丕”。大。
[②]［fǒu］
［《廣韻》方久切，上有，非。］
同“否1”。
[③]［fōu］
［《廣韻》甫鳩切，平尤，非。］
姓。汉有不疑。见《後汉书·皇甫规传》。
[④]［fū］
［《集韻》風無切，平虞，非。］
花蒂。
[⑤]［pǐ］
［《韻补》補美切，上紙］
通“否2”。<

呂字的康熙字典解释

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形

暂无。

Lu
Basic explanation of words
Lu
lǚ
Same as "Lu".
Lu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bù］
["Guangyun" is divided into do not cut, into things, not. ]
(1) No, no.
(2) No, no.
(3) No, no.
(4) Adverbs. Table negation.
(5) Adverbs. Table prohibited. Don't, don't.
(6) Adverbs. Use it alone to make a negative answer.
(7) Adverbs. dialect. Used at the end of a sentence to express a question, it is equivalent to a repeated question.
(8) Adverbs. Used in the middle of the dynamic compensation structure, it means that it is impossible to achieve a certain result.
(9) Adverbs. The same nouns are used before and after the word "bu", which means that they don't care or are irrelevant.
(10) Adverbs. Used with "convenience" and "just" to indicate choice.
(11) Adverbs. dialect. No; don't (limited to certain phrases).
(12) Particles. Meaningless. Use full sentences or to strengthen the tone.
(13) Particles. Meaningless. Indicates a rhetorical tone.
(14) Link "Pi". Big.
[②]［fǒu］
["Guangyun" Fang Jiu cut, there is no. ]
Same as "No 1".
[③] [fōu]
["Guangyun" Fu Jiuqie, Pingyou, Fei. ]
name. Han has no doubts. See "Book of the Later Han·Huangfu Rules Biography".
[④]［fū］
["Jiyun" wind is not cut, Pingyu, non. ]
Flower pedicle.
[⑤] [pǐ]
["Yunbu" to make up the beauty and cut, put on paper]
Pass "No 2".
Lu

呂

Значения

Мелодия

Мнемоника

Позвоночник с позвонками или лады струнного инструмента.

Варианты

吕

Radicals: 呂  (bathtub)
Meaning Mnemonic
I hope all you're doing in the bathtub is taking a bath. I mean, you can do other things if you want I guess. But bathtubs were made just for baths!
Picture yourself taking a bath in your bathtub. Relaxing!
Reading Mnemonic
When do you miss taking a bath the most? When you're on the road (ろ). Traveling is fun and all, but when you're stuck in a car, traveling down a dirt road for days, all you want to do is take a nice long bath.
Imagine being stuck on the road all day for a week. Imagine how good a bath will feel when you finally get home. Nice and hot and relaxing. Mmmm...
